title: [Large-scale] Mathematics Instructional Design Studio Education via Informal Peer Review

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in designing and developing foundational mathematics education materials
context.additional_context: A blended course (online: assignment submission/feedback; offline: peer critique sessions) for learners with experience in developing math education materials but requiring systematic training in instructional design methodologies.

learning_goals: Learners can apply ≥80% of effective feedback criteria while critiquing peers' mathematics instructional design products
Learners can generate ≥3 improvement proposals for their instructional design drafts through ≥2 peer critique sessions
Learners can submit ≥2 revised outcomes in their mathematics instructional design portfolios reflecting critique experiences
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
